sentences.english: And if you just as first, don't be sad and leave.

sentences.english: Who needs clothes when you can fight naked?

sentences.english: Why, then, should we stand in awe of one who is as frail as ourselves?

sentences.english: But I love you once, why you hurt me so deep.
